content: plush chicken crochet pattern i would say this pattern is a perfect pattern for beginners especially if you are just starting out working with the plush yarn there is some sewing required but the pattern is very straight forward and works up very quickly materials used size 6mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors tapestry needle yarn used bernat blanket yarn stitches and abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet 2sc make 2 single_crochet into the same stitch sc2together single_crochet decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain chain fasten_off cut the yarn *tip* i like to use the hidden decrease where i only go into the first loop of each stitch when making a decrease that way the stitch blends right in with the others pattern was created and designed by cloverandoak do not redistribute the pattern in any way - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - the chicken is worked in rounds do not slip_stitch or chain in between rounds use a stitch marker in the 1st stitch of each round start by making a chain of 2 and make 6sc into the 1st chain round 1 repeat in every stitch around 2sc 12 round 2 repeat pattern around *single_crochet 1 2sc 18 round 3 repeat pattern around *single_crochet 1 in the next 2 stitches 2sc in next* 24 round 4 repeat pattern around *single_crochet 1 in the next 3 stitches 2sc in the next* 30 for the next 6 rounds single_crochet 1 in each stitch around 30 round 11 single_crochet 7 *put a stitch marker in the 1st stitch of the round* count 7 stitches from the stitch marker going in the other direction single_crochet 1 into the 7th stitch then continue making 1 single_crochet into the next 6 stitches going back towards the stitch marker 14 round 12 single_crochet around the next area you created single_crochet 1 in the next 14 stitches 14 sc2together until there is 5 stitches remaining and then sew the head closed pull the yarn through the top of the head stuff the chicken and use the yarn you pulled through the head to close off the back comb make a chain of 5 and make *1 half_double_crochet and slip_stitch into the same stitch* into 4 chains starting from the 2nd chain from the hook fasten_off and leave a piece of yarn to use for sewing the comb onto the chickens head sew the comb onto the head starting at the very top of the head wings make 2 wings make a chain of 5 2sc into the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 1 in the next 2 chains 2sc into the last chain 6 for 2 row make 1sc into each stitch chain 1 and turn after each row fasten_off and leave some yarn to use for sewing position the wings on the side of the body about 3 row down and sew that s it when you are finished
